name: Handpainted Tee Shirt
description:
This is a new line I am going to be doing of completely one-of-a-kind t-shirts. I have been doing this to my clothes for years. The sharpie doesn't wash out and gives a nice, artistic line almost like a charcoal pencil.

Washer and dryer safe.

All my items are made in my one-woman studio in Oakland, CA.

I love custom work, and there is no additional charge. Convo me so we can make something just the way you like it. If you want to send me a t-shirt to decorate, I can knock a bit off the price. Let's talk.

name: Knitted belt, underbust cincher, buckles, leather
description:
This underbust cincher is comfy and adds definition and elegance to your silhouette. Made from organic wool on a light linen backing. 

Lined knit belt with tough leather and buckles. It measures 31" / 79 cm for an under bust cinch. Please contact me regarding special orders, I would be happy to make you something in your size. This belt is not adjustable or stretchy.

This is a one of a kind piece, so when it sells, it's gone. I made each of my pieces one at a time in Oakland, CA.

name: Knitted Dress in Merino Wool, Heartburst Dress - Fall 2012 Preview
description:
Knitted dress is a very light worsted merino wool. Pair with tights and boots for a uniquely elegant Fall look. 

Jagger Brothers has been producing fine wool yarns since the 1860's, and this merino of theirs is a durable, high performance fiber that will not pill.

All my pieces are made one at a time in Oakland, CA. Contact me about custom sizes and colors.

name: Sailing Top in Organic, Undyed, California Grown Fox Fiber Cotton
description:
Fox Fiber Cotton was specially developed by Sally Fox to address all of the agricultural problems associated with cotton. Read more about her Fox Fiber here: http://foxfibre.com/
The fiber is grown and milled into yarn here in California.

Fox Fiber feels like Pima Cotton and is perfect for warm weather.

Designed to be extremely ventilated while also shading one from the sun. 

Handmade, one at a time, in Oakland, CA.

Belt is not included.

Each

name: Organic Men's Sweater with Leather Plackets
description:
Organic worsted wool from Springvale, ME is soft, and a high performance fiber. Lambskin leather plackets sourced in Napa, CA. Buttons are made from off cuts in an off-the-grid mill in Vermont.

Comfort, dashing style and responsible sourcing. 

Made by hand, one at a time, in Oakland, CA. 

This item is custom, made to order. See color options, below.
